channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD

item.title: Report X-2024080281
item.description:
Report X-2024080281

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-12T15:14:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-04
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING DURING SORTATION. THE GLASS BOTTLE WAS SHATTERED CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT AND REACT TO THE METAL ON THE TUGGER TRAIN CART. AMPHOMAG NEUTRALIZER WAS USED TO STOP THE REACTION AND CLEAN UP THE SPILL.
